title: Get the Comment-to-Message setting of a Business Account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok Business Account owner. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: direct_reply_type
parameters.description: The type of direct reply. Enum value: COMMENT_TO_MESSAGE : Comment-to-Message. Once you enable this feature, the TikTok system will identify high-intent comments, enabling you to send customized replies to assist these users more effectively.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: business_id
fields.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok Business Account.

fields.name: direct_reply_type
fields.description: The type of direct reply. Enum value: COMMENT_TO_MESSAGE : Comment-to-Message. Once you enable this feature, the TikTok system will identify high-intent comments, enabling you to send customized replies to assist these users more effectively.

fields.name: operation_status
fields.description: The status of the direct reply type ( direct_reply_type ). Enum values: ENABLE : Enabled. DISABLE : Disabled. If you want to enable or disable this setting, use /business/message/direct_reply/update/ .
